name: proj
description: سیستم حضور و غیاب با تشخیص چهره

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd next && npm run dev" "cd nest && npm run start:dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd next && npm run build" "cd nest && npm run build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd next && npm start" "cd nest && npm run start:prod"
scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd next && npm install && cd ../nest && npm install
